name: Grim Adventure
description:
SPECIAL THANKS TO Fr1edt0ast for the Skye Character

WARNING: THIS GAME IS A PROTOTYPE EXPECT BUGS AND GLITCHES

"Grim Adventure" is a simple platformer game made in Game Maker Studio

There are only 2 levels as of now

In the game you have to find all the keys to make it to the next door to unlock the next level.
